mapper.select: select *,(select rolename from cp_role where roleid=rid) role from cp_staff where staffid=#{id}
select count(0) from plan where `date` = date(`date`) and cid in (select id from clazz where teacherId = #{people.id}) and study=true

select * from cp_staff where id in (select teacherId from clazz where id in (select id from clazz where gradeId in (select gid from grade_floor where floor=(select floor from classroom where id=#{room.id}))) group by teacherId ) and id not in (select teacherId from clazz where id in (select cid from plan where `date` between date(#{begin}) and date(#{end}) and study=true and study=false ))
select * from cp_staff where rid in (select roleid from cp_role where canTeacher=true)
select 1 from plan where `date` =date(#{day}) and ap=#{ap} and cid in (select id from clazz where teacherId =#{teacher.id}) and study=true
select 1 from class_calendar where `date`=date(#{day}) and (ap=0 or ap=2ap=1) and id in(select cid from calendar_teacher where pid=#{teacher.id})
